message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am confident that this product could significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your growth. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This offer takes into account the high quality and potential impact on your business, aiming to provide a fair balance between value and cost. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
